sections.value:
# The Wipple Playground

Welcome! Wipple is a programming language that's designed to be natural to read, write and learn. This interactive guide is meant for people who have never written code before — if you're already experienced in other languages, please read [the quick start guides](#) instead.

The Wipple Playground provides a simple, easy-to-use environment for writing Wipple code. Just type into the code editor and your code will run instantly, displaying its output below. The playground also automatically detects errors in your code and highlights them in red, just like a word processor!

Throughout this guide, any time you see text in `this font`, it represents code. Any outlined code section (like the one below) can be edited directly, so feel free to play around with it — you'll learn more by experimenting!

name : input "What is your name?"
show (format "Welcome to Wipple, _!" name)
Now click the right arrow to continue on to the next page!
